sentence.text: In 20/23 cases, MDRnegative regulation of gene expression BSI occurred during neutropenia.

MDR rectal colonization occurs in 6.5% of haematological inpatients and predicts a 16% probability of MDRnegative regulation of gene expression BSI, particularly during neutropenia, as well as a higher probability of unfavourable outcomes in positive regulation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration-rel BSIs.

entity.text: positive regulation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration
